issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
The keyboardframechanged events works well. It would be great if this can be made available for Android too so the code can be more cross-platform.

Right now, we're writing on UI code for iOS and have to hack around to get an Android version working
fields.summary: Android: Enable 'keyboardframechanged' Event on android platform

comments.body: This seems like a parity ticket, not an improvement.
